channel.title: Server Announcements
channel.description: Can anyone make a code for me that if you say like ::announcement [message here] it will show up in the chat box to everybody as... [ANNOUNCEMENT] whatever you typed will appear here. And make it only for admins and owners please.

item.title: Server Announcements
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Just make the command change the PlayerHandler class’ messageToAll variable and the message will be sent to all players.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Announcements
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Um… i mean all server have that command ? some place in the source. ? if you dont you can, try to download an other soruce and copy it ?

Read full topic
